t: How Scan-Based Trading Can Improve Inventory Management and Increase Customer Satisfaction
s: Over time, retailers have sought to leverage their suppliers, bestowing to them the responsibility for in-store inventory, which is known as Vendor-Owned Inventory Management. Scan-based trading (SBT) is the most sophisticated of the three forms, the other two being Consignment and Pay-On-Scan.

t: Scan-based trading - Wikipedia
s: October 26, 2024 - Scan-based trading (SBT) is the process by which suppliers maintain ownership of inventory within retailers' warehouses or stores until items are scanned at the point of sale.
